## Connection.getRecentBlockhash() method

Fetch a recent blockhash from the cluster

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getRecentBlockhash(commitment?: Commitment): Promise<{
        blockhash: Blockhash;
        feeCalculator: FeeCalculator;
    }>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  commitment | [Commitment](./web3.js.commitment.md) | optional commitment level, defaults to class commitment level |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;{ blockhash: Blockhash; feeCalculator: FeeCalculator; }&gt;
